comments:
Description:
   the dataset property binding can not work

Steps to reproduce:
  1. new a datasource and a dataset
  2. new a report parameter
  3. double click the dataset, set to the parameter to the dataset property binding.

Actual result:
   java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: java.math.BigDecimal.<init>(J)V

Can't be reproduced using the latest codes
This bug is still exist in the build 20060412 AllInOne
The problem happens when trying to run the 1.5 compiled code in 1.4

This bug is reopened.

Its stops a feature when the user in under JDK1.4_x environment. The quick fix will be that Model explicitly specify the constructor of BigDecimal. 

Use "new BigDecimal( (double) id )" instead of "new BigDecimal( id )", as the later code is not binary-level compatible between JDK1.4x and JDK5.0x
*** Bug 137163 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
